post.summary: User system sign in
User sign in
Refresh user sign in
Set the POPS machine to the database
Displays a list of stores owned by the company
Displays detail store information
Displays a list of devices owned by the store
Set the devices to the database. action 1:INSERT; 2:UPDATE: 3:DELETE;
Displays a list of Register owned by the store and the devices related to the register
Set the registers to the database. action 2:UPDATE selected columns only.
Displays all users of the company.
Displays all items of the company.
Displays all item's price rule of the company.
Displays all categories.
Displays all taxes of the company.
Displays all tax overrides of the store.
Displays general setting (global and company based / store based / register based / device based). The record will not be downloaded if one of the ID's column is INACTIVE.
Display rounding rules.
Displays country
Displays state
Displays nationality.
Displays field option.
Displays language.
Displays language labels (translations).
Displays department.
Displays cash denominations.
Displays tender types.
Displays general reasons.
Displays currencies.
Set currencies.
Displays service charges.
Displays custom configuration (company based / store based / register based). The record will not be downloaded if one of the ID's column is INACTIVE.
Set the Custom Configurations to the database.
Displays sync logs based on the store id.
Set the Sync Log to the database.
Set the Sync Conflict Log to the database.
Displays customers based on the company id.
Displays customer address based on the customers in the company.
Displays customer groups based on the company id.
Set the Customers to the database.
Displays business days based on the company and store id.
Set the business day to the database.
Displays day shifts based on the company and store id.
Set the shift day to the database.
Displays attendances based on the store id.
Set the attendances to the database.
